languages.text: "Я огласил себе приговор. Дело не в разжаловании, хотя оно стало последней каплей. Я не могу больше — не могу больше видеть лживых губернаторов, не могу видеть сволочей, отдавшихся скверне..."

"I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. Not because of the demotion, though it was the last straw. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption..."
languages.original_text: "Я огласил себе приговор. Дело не в разжаловании, хотя оно стало последней каплей. Я не могу больше — не могу больше видеть лживых губернаторов, не могу видеть сволочей, отдавшихся скверне..."

traits.locale_text: "I have pronounced judgment upon myself. It was not the demotion that broke me, though it was the last straw. I cannot stand it anymore. I cannot stand to see any more lying governors, or blackguards reveling in corruption..."

"I have pronounced judgment upon myself. It was not the demotion that broke me, though it was the last straw. I cannot stand it anymore. I cannot stand to see any more lying governors, or blackguards reveling in corruption..."

"I have pronounced judgment upon myself. It was not the demotion that broke me, though it was the last straw. I cannot stand it anymore. I cannot stand to see any more lying governors, or blackguards revelling in corruption..."

"I have pronounced judgment upon myself. It was not the demotion that broke me, though it was the last straw. I cannot stand it anymore. I cannot stand to see any more lying governors, or blackguards revelling in corruption..."

"I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. Not because of the demotion, though it was the last straw. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption..."

"I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. Not because of the demotion, though it was the last straw. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption..."

languages.text: 「俺は自分自身を裁き、判決を下した。降格が原因じゃない。決定的な要因ではあったけど。もう限界だ。嘘をつく総督たち、腐敗に屈する悪党たちを見ていることはできない…」
languages.original_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. Not because of the demotion, though it was the last straw. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption..."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は自分自身を裁き、判決を下した。降格が原因じゃない。決定的な要因ではあったけど。もう限界だ。嘘をつく総督たち、腐敗に屈する悪党たちを見ていることはできない…」

languages.text: "Ich habe über mich geurteilt und die Strafe verhängt. Nicht wegen der Degradierung, obwohl die das Fass zum Überlaufen gebracht hat. Ich kann so nicht mehr weitermachen – ich kann die verlogenen Gouverneure nicht mehr sehen, die Schurken, die der Korruption anheimfallen ..."
languages.original_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. Not because of the demotion, though it was the last straw. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe über mich geurteilt und die Strafe verhängt. Nicht wegen der Degradierung, obwohl die das Fass zum Überlaufen gebracht hat. Ich kann so nicht mehr weitermachen – ich kann die verlogenen Gouverneure nicht mehr sehen, die Schurken, die der Korruption anheimfallen ..."

languages.text: « Je me suis jugé et condamné moi-même. Non pas à cause de ma rétrogradation, même si cela a été la goutte d'eau qui a fait déborder le vase. Je ne tolère plus tout ceci : je ne peux plus supporter la vue de ces gouverneurs malhonnêtes, de ces scélérats qui succombent à la corruption... »
languages.original_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. Not because of the demotion, though it was the last straw. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption..."

traits.locale_text: « Je me suis jugé et condamné moi-même. Non pas à cause de ma rétrogradation, même si cela a été la goutte d'eau qui a fait déborder le vase. Je ne tolère plus tout ceci : je ne peux plus supporter la vue de ces gouverneurs malhonnêtes, de ces scélérats qui succombent à la corruption... »

languages.text: «Yo mismo me he juzgado y he ejecutado la sentencia. No a causa de mi degradación, aunque sin duda fue la gota que colmó el vaso. No puedo seguir haciéndolo; estoy harto de gobernadores que mienten, de rufianes que sucumben a la corrupción...».
languages.original_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. Not because of the demotion, though it was the last straw. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption..."

traits.locale_text: «Yo mismo me he juzgado y he ejecutado la sentencia. No a causa de mi degradación, aunque sin duda fue la gota que colmó el vaso. No puedo seguir haciéndolo; estoy harto de gobernadores que mienten, de rufianes que sucumben a la corrupción...».

languages.text: “我已经对自己进行了审判，宣读了判决。降职处罚并不是我崩溃的原因，尽管它确实是最后一根稻草。我再也受不了这一切了，我再也不想看到那些满口谎言的总督，还有投入腐化怀抱的渣滓……”
languages.original_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. Not because of the demotion, though it was the last straw. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption..."

traits.locale_text: “我已经对自己进行了审判，宣读了判决。降职处罚并不是我崩溃的原因，尽管它确实是最后一根稻草。我再也受不了这一切了，我再也不想看到那些满口谎言的总督，还有投入腐化怀抱的渣滓……”

languages.text: "Ben kendimi yargıladım ve cezamı verdim. Görevimden alındığım için değildi elbet ancak o son damla oldu. Artık dayanamıyorum. Palavracı valilerin, yolsuzluğa boyun eğen alçakların yüzlerine bakmaya katlanamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. Not because of the demotion, though it was the last straw. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption..."

traits.locale_text: "Ben kendimi yargıladım ve cezamı verdim. Görevimden alındığım için değildi elbet ancak o son damla oldu. Artık dayanamıyorum. Palavracı valilerin, yolsuzluğa boyun eğen alçakların yüzlerine bakmaya katlanamıyorum."
